001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.Array;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.Strategy;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.TrainableFunction;
006
007/**
008 * A scalar-valued function that is both {@link TrainableFunction} and
009 * {@link ScalarEstimationFunction}.
010 * <p>
011 * Implementations represent functions {@code f(x; θ)} with trainable parameters θ
012 * that produce a scalar output for a given input vector. This interface provides
013 * a way to compute parameter parameterGradients needed for training via backpropagation.
014 */
015@Strategy(Strategy.Role.INTERFACE)
016public interface TrainableScalarFunction<N extends Number> extends TrainableFunction<N>, ScalarEstimationFunction<N> {
017
018    /**
019     * Calculates the parameterGradients of the scalar function with respect to its
020     * trainable parameters, given the input values.
021     *
022     * @param inputs the input feature vector to the function
023     * @return an array of partial derivatives
024     * {@code ∂f/∂θ_k} for each parameter θ_k
025     */
026    Array<N> calculateParameterGradients(Array<N> inputs);
027
028}
